summary: An ordinance authorizing the purchase from Chevra Bikur Cholum corporation of certain property and property rights, including the right to make slopes for cuts or fills upon the abutting property, necessary for the establishing of Stone Avenue from North 11th Street to North 120th Street, and of a portion of the intersection of Ashworth Avenue and North 120th Street previously contemplated by condemnation Ordinance 87999; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund in connection therewith, and declaring the emergency therefor.
